channel.title: [1.5.1][MyTown][aPerf][Offline-mode] TTTL
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2upg0w6.png[/img][/center]
Installed plugins:
[ol][li]MyTown [list] [li]Hero Chat[/li] [li]Residency [/li] [li]Towns[/li] [li]Diamond based economy[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Aperf [list] [li]Item stacking[/li] [li]XP orb grouping[/li] [/list][/li] [li]World-Backup[/li][/ol]
About the server, a brief history. The first TTTL server was based off the original Tekkit, what is now considered Tekkit Classic. It was hosted for about a month from mid-December 2012 to about mid-January 2013. Basically the time frame that I was home from uni on break. I felt it went well since I initially hosted it for some people I met on vanilla Moparcraft and they seemed to enjoy it. I've learned a lot from that experience and what it takes to host and manage a modded Minecraft server (mostly performance issues). Since I am almost done with exams and summer break is around the corner. I've deemed it fit to start working, taking into account a lot of issues that were(are) on MoparFTB, on my own server with only banning items that I've felt did not affect game-play drastically and heavily improved the long term performance the server.
Current banned items:
[ol][li]All blocks/addons/modules that keep a chunk(s) loaded [list] [li]Chunkloader[/li] [li]Chunk Loader Module[/li] [li]Dimensional Anchor[/li] [li]Teleport Tethers[/li] [/list][/li] [li]Rift blade (still undecided)[/li][/ol]
Current Staff (those who are welcomed back):
[ol][li]Relmitos (Admin)[/li] [li]Agl1431 (Sr. Mod)[/li] [li]Big_n12 (Sr. Mod)[/li] [li]Open (Mod)[/li] [li]Open (Mod)[/li][/ol]
That's about it, still working on the server and still need some testers (you'll be rewarded, don't you worry). So post if your interested or not lol. Oh and also, the server will have a vps (A 40-50 slot one preferably) once everything seems to be in working order a couple weeks into beta.

item.title: [1.5.1][MyTown][aPerf][Offline-mode] TTTL
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Phaze One:

Is that the new powersuit? Looks neat

Yeah

Updates round 2:
Themed server, “Space race”
Increased Nation chunk claims (towns grow into nations)
Nations retain all of the features of Towns and have towns within them (Other towns can merge with nations or start their own)
Grief prevention works better then expected
Added Mod/Trusted user groups
1 banned item currently

What needs to be added:
World Edit or voxel sniper
Voting system with ingame economy rewards and claims (1 claim is 1 chunk so 16x16=256 blocks)
Thaumcraft integration
EE3 removal
enabling snoop feature for Town Mayors?

Spending ~$40 for vps hosting for a 50 slot server (2-3 weeks into the launch to see if people actually want to play)

Possible staff: depending if they actually want to do it
Relmitos (OP/Admin)
Agl1431 <3 (Sr. Mod) (Can spawn items)
Big_n12 <3 (Sr. Mod) (Can spawn items)
KickingJamie (Mod)

(Not choosy or anything, they are just the ones who played on a server of mine)

Read full topic

item.title: [1.5.1][MyTown][aPerf][Offline-mode] TTTL
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

Edit 1:
Grief prevention (encompasses everything from locked chests to custom player logging and tracking )
Residancy
Town Hierarchy
Item + xp stacking (something that really needs to be added to moparcraft LOLOL, lets hope tom got my message and didn’t just shove it to the side)
Groups
Anti-bitch pvp (lol)
Chat channels
World(s) Backups (There’s like 6+ worlds, 2 or 3 of which have multiple dimensions meaning slighly to radically different versions of the same world)
Offline-mode and non-whitelisted (at first)

Read full topic
